txt.en: Search the caskets for untouched remains
Bring the untouched remains to Damrod in Barad Orhant

'I am surprised you were able to find even a few untouched remains, but it is a welcome discovery. I will have these safely sent away to Minas Tirith, where they may once again know peace. I thank you for your efforts.'
Caskets can be found in Dâr Grazadh.\n\nYou should search the caskets for untouched remains.
These remains have been desecrated by the forces of evil

Dâr Grazadh, once a great guild-hall of Minas Ithil, is now a hall of rot that houses the Dead in caskets that line the walls. These caskets may have been brought here from Gondor's old burial houses just outside the city. Perhaps some of the remains have yet to be desecrated. You should search the caskets for untouched remains.
Damrod can be found in Barad Orhant in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should bring the untouched remains to Damrod.
Dâr Grazadh, once a great guild-hall of Minas Ithil, is now a hall of rot that houses the Dead in their many forms.
Caskets can be found in Dâr Grazadh.\n\nYou should search the caskets for untouched remains.
